content: {"locationId": "8517", "organizationId": "7027", "name": "Rural Human Services", "address1": "286 M St", "address2": "", "city": "Crescent City", "state": "CA", "zipCode": "95531", "country": null, "phone": "", "phoneExt": "", "website": "https://ruralhumanservices.net/Our-Services/Food-Bank/", "latitude": "41.75466", "longitude": "-124.1928", "foodPrograms": "Food Distribution", "serviceAreas": "COUNTY:  Del Norte", "languages": "English, Spanish", "features": "Near Public Transit", "aboutUs": "Starting on May 2025,      Food distributions are drive through only.    there will be no parking at this location until January 2026. Foods distributed are income-based programs, including TEFAP (The Emergency Food Assistance Program) and Senior box (CSFP/Commodity Supplemental Food Box). ID required for Senior boxes   only   and must have proof of residency in one of the following counties. Del Norte, Humboldt, Sanoma, Lake and Mendicino.  We are located on Highway 101 North next to Verizon.", "notes": "Effective May 1, 2025         RHS food bank location will be open the 3rd. week of the month on Wednesday and Thursday only. Except July and September will be the 4th week of the month Wednesday and Thursday only.   New Hours will be 9-3    June through December our parking lot will be under construction for our New Food bank storage facility. While under construction we will have a drive through distribution at this location only. Please follow all signs and staff instructions. thank you for your patience with us as we update our facility to better serve you.  Proud partners with REFB and TEFAP", "contactName": "", "contactPhone": "707-464-7441", "contactEmail": "", "servicePrograms": "", "foodServiceTypes": "CSFP Program, Curbside or Drive Through, Lifting / Carrying Assistance, Pre-Packed Boxes / Bags, TEFAP Program, Walking Through", "dietRestrictions": "", "foodOfferings": "Dairy, Fruits & Vegetables, Meat, Other, Shelf Stable/Non-Perishable Goods", "networkAffiliations": [{"regionId": 59, "regionName": "Redwood Empire Food Bank", "logoBlobNameSmall": "1f934c90-6fab-4f51-9c97-aef07a96094a.png", "website": "https://refb.org/"}], "timeZoneName": "Pacific Standard Time", "timeZoneCode": "PT", "offsetHours": "-7", "schedules": ["Monday 9:00 AM-4:00 PM (Closed 12-1 for lunch daily)", "Tuesday 9:00 AM-4:00 PM (Closed 12-1 for lunch daily)", "Wednesday 9:00 AM-4:00 PM (Closed 12-1 for lunch daily)", "Thursday 9:00 AM-4:00 PM (Closed 12-1 for lunch daily)", "Friday 9:00 AM-4:00 PM (Closed 12-1 for lunch daily)"], "services": [], "specialHours": []}
